item.title: KOFFVQA: An Objectively Evaluated Free-form VQA Benchmark for Large Vision-Language Models in the Korean Language
item.description: KOFFVQA: Objectively evaluates Korean VLMs with a new free-form VQA benchmark, improving evaluation reliability via detailed grading criteria.
